body:
Comment 6: 
The install docs are explicit that you need ed.

Eventually there will be binary packages with
everything pre-built.  Those will not require
ed or any of the other build tools, but for now,
the simplest fix is for you to install ed.

I appreciate your concern, but ed is one of the
very earliest Unix tools, as has been pointed out.
It's reasonable to assume that it exists.
Comparing it to xfig is not a valid comparison.
_Owner changed to **r...@golang.org**._ _Status changed to **WontFix**._
